response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is worth $10,000 to you based on your needs. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $8,500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to meet your specific requirements and maximize your investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 8500}
